title: Jug And Cover, 1926-37-125, 1781
description: Urn shaped body on stem with stepped, circular foot; urn shaped finial on domed cover extending over lip; body decorated with beading and bright-cut engraving; family arms engraved on both sides; tan wood handle with leaf attachments.
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
markings: Under foot: four marks: lion passant, crowned leopard's head (London), f (date letter), and maker's mark (undechipherable).  On cover: lion passant, date letter (undecipherable). [info. source: catalogue card]
